import java.util.*;

public class faketree {
    public static long ans = 0;
    public static int N = 2 * 100000 + 10;
    public static List<List<Integer>> tree;
    public static int[] l = new int[N], r = new int[N];

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        int t = sc.nextInt();
        while (t-- > 0) {
            int n = sc.nextInt();
            tree = new ArrayList<List<Integer>>();
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
                tree.add(new ArrayList<Integer>());
            }
            for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
                int p = sc.nextInt();
                tree.get(p).add(i);
            }
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
                l[i] = sc.nextInt();
                r[i] = sc.nextInt();
            }
            ans = 0;
            dfs(1);
            System.out.println(ans);
        }
    }

    public static long dfs(int node) {
        long s = 0;
        for (int child : tree.get(node)) {
            s += dfs(child);
        }
        if (s < l[node]) {
            ans += 1;
            return r[node];
        }
        return Math.min(r[node], s);
    }
}
